text: Padang is the capital city of the Indonesian province of West Sumatra, and the largest city on the western coast of Sumatra.Colombijn, Freek, (1996), Padang, Cities (Elsevier), Vol. 13, Issue 4, August 1996, pp. 281-288, doi:10.1016/0264-2751(96)00010-8 ==References== Category:Cities in Indonesia Category:1669 establishments Category:West Sumatra Category:17th-century establishments in Asia
title: Padang
